name: promptAIzer
description: This extension is a versatile text processing tool that integrates with the context menu, offering various options to manipulate and understand selected text. By utilizing OpenAI's GPT-4 API, the extension can summarize text, explain content in different levels of detail, solve problems, provide examples, generate code, fact-check, assess the trustworthiness of information, create DALL-E prompts, and build... Users can customize the extension by adding new menu items in the options page.
